settings.rc_body:
We are on a mission to improve nutrition in India,
so that everyone can live life to the fullest!
If you are a curious person who enjoys learning new things,
pushing your intellectual limits, and working on projects that have
never been done before, then Earthful is the right place for you.

settings.title: Why join Earthful ?
settings.text:
We are on a mission to improve nutrition in India,
so that everyone can live life to the fullest!
If you are a curious person who enjoys learning new things,
pushing your intellectual limits, and working on projects that have
never been done before, then Earthful is the right place for you.

settings.content_text:
Responsibilities

  • Create & execute Content for all marketing & branding initiatives of Earthful.
  • Write advertisement content for social media platform.
  • Regularly produce various content types, including social media posts, blogs, ad copies, emailers, press releases, whatsapp marketing copies, website content, etc
  • Analyse content marketing metrics and make changes as needed
  • Collaborate with other departments like marketing, design, sales and customer service to ensure brand consistency & create innovative content ideas.

Skill Sets

  • Highly creative in Copywriting
  • Passionate about thinking out of the box content Ideas
  • Good Communication skills - written and verbal.
  • Strong MS office knowledge
  • Prior experience in a similar role is a plus

    Your talents can change the world! Connect with us at careers@earthful.me.
    Join the Earthful revolution!

Responsibilities

  • Responsible for defining, analyzing and communicating key business metrics and business trends to the management teams.
  • Build data models in order to create dashboards for business process management
  • Execute quantitative analysis that translates data into actionable insights
  • Analyse business metrics across all functions- Marketing, Customer Acquisition, Retention, Supply Chain, Logistics, etc.
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure solutions are implemented effectively


Skill Sets

  • Advance Excel proficiency.
  • High expertise in Data Analytics, Data Mining and Data Management.
  • Good Communication Skills - Verbal and Written.
  • High ownership.

    Your talents can change the world! Connect with us at careers@earthful.me.
    Join the Earthful revolution!

Responsibilities

  • Ability to generate & analyze Consumer insights to improve Brand positioning
  • Ability to run Branding campaigns end to end, including developing a value proposition, creative communication, media distribution, and tracking campaign ROI
  • Having a creative eye for unique marketing & branding concepts & passionate enough to take it to fruition, in the most cost-effective way
  • Coordinating with external agencies & internal teams to prepare creative briefs and media plans for campaigns while ensuring that brand guidelines are effectively followed
  • Leading a team, setting goals and tuning them to give their best performance
  • Work with the design team, videographers, content writers, and freelancers to create visually appealing assets for social engagement.
  • Identify and work with relevant Influencers and PR agencies
  • 360-degree ownership of content calendars across multiple channels- Social media (Paid, Organic), Email, Whatsapp, etc
  • Monitoring key metrics across campaigns to ensure effectiveness
  • Evaluating the competitive landscape to identify opportunities and threats to the brand.
  • Staying up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in branding and marketing

Skill Sets

  • Passionate about any creative skill eg: Graphic designing/Video editing/Videography/Photography,etc.
  • Creative aptitude in Visual design
  • Good Communication skills - written and verbal. Strong MS office knowledge
  • 2+ years of experience in Brand Management, Acquisition & Growth
  • Content Writing and Proofreading
  • Exceptional persuasive written, verbal, and presentation communication skills.

    Your talents can change the world! Connect with us at careers@earthful.me.
    Join the Earthful revolution!

Responsibilities

  • Exploring right channels for distribution of our products such as specialty stores, nutritionists, modern trade channels, etc.
  • Creating a database of potential partners & identifying contacts
  • Pitching to the partners regarding our products, Negotiate contract terms with partners and communicate terms to stakeholders
  • Collaborate with the operation team to establish smooth supply of products & also ensure payments are made on time. Plans the revenue targets for the company
    from the partners/ channels & develops action plans to execute them.
  • Minimum 1-2 Years in the Retail Sales & General Trade
  • Delivering Sales Volume Primary and Secondary target assigned to the Area

Skill Sets

  • Good Communication skills - written and verbal.
  • Willingness to commute and meet channel partners within the city. (Having their own vehicle is necessary)

    Your talents can change the world! Connect with us at careers@earthful.me.
    Join the Earthful revolution!
